name: Grok
description: Interact with xAI's Grok API to generate text responses

preferences.name: Grok API Key
preferences.description: Obtain your API key from https://console.x.ai

preferences.name: Grok Model
preferences.description: Specify the Grok model (e.g., grok-3-beta). See https://x.ai/api for available models.

preferences.name: Line Length
preferences.description: Maximum characters per line for response text (e.g., 80).

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.default_value: Provide concise and accurate responses. Convert natural language instructions into Linux commands. You have been programmed to understand a wide set of commands Linux related commands. You should only answer with the best and most relevant linux command, no descriptions or context, just return the command, do not use 'new lines'

preferences.name: Max Tokens
preferences.description: Maximum tokens to generate (1-4096, depending on model).
